_command.title: Translate in Place
_config.api_key_desc: You will need to register for a free Google Cloud account and create an API Key for their translation service. See the Read Me.
_err.no_api_key: A Google Translate API key must be entered in the Extension preferences.
_err.cant_load_prefs: Unable to load project preferences. Weird.
_err.network: The translation server returned an error. Unable to process request.
_err.bad_response: The translation server was unable to process request.
